panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job="$job", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job="$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", handler="query"}[$interval])) * 1 / sum by (job) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests against /query_range.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval])) * 1 / sum by (job) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from other queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_started_total{job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, grpc_method, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_sum{job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) * 1
/
sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_count{job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, grpc_method, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{job="$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from other queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_started_total{job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, grpc_method, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_sum{job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) * 1
/
sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_count{job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, grpc_method, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{job="$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of DNS lookups to discover stores.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of failures compared to the the total number of executed DNS lookups.
panels.title: Errors
